thread.title: Opening Ceremony Puts a Rugged Spin on the Vans Sk8-Hi
thread.title_full: Opening Ceremony Puts a Rugged Spin on the Vans Sk8-Hi

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Opening Ceremony Puts a Rugged Spin on the Vans Sk8-Hi
text:
Opening Ceremony has dropped a ton of exclusive Vans in recent months, teaming up with Natalie Westling for a special Sk8-Hi before dropping its own "Big Cat" pack and "Mono" release . Now you can add yet another exclusive to the fray as Carol Lim and Humberto Leon have reworked the Sk8-Hi yet again for the inclement weather of the season. Coming in the form of the rugged MTE edition of the high-top, the release boasts all-brown and all-black colorways, each of which sees the familiar skateboarding silhouette with winter updates like Scotchgard-treated leather uppers, shearling lining, gusseted tongues, D-ring boot grommets and a heat-retention layer between the sockliners and improved traction outsoles.
Both versions can be picked up online now for $120 USD each while supplies last.
Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast.com
